definition[0]: the central and most important part of an area, system, activity etc, which all the other parts are connected to
example[0]: the commercial hub of the region
example[1]: Birmingham is at the hub of Britainâ€™s motorway network.
definition[1]: the central part of a wheel to which the axle is joined
definition[2]: a city or country where there is a lot of business activity because it is central in relation to other places, there are good communications etc
example[2]: The city has become a hub for Asian markets and a financial center.
definition[3]: an airport with a lot of flights where people can easily change planes to go on to somewhere else
example[3]: They want to develop the airport as a European hub.
